name: Swift Package Exporter Sample File
description:
Swift Package Exporter is a plugin that generates SwiftUI from your design tokens and exports them as a package that you can include in Xcode. This is a sample file has several text, color, effect and grid styles setup so you can test out the plugin and see how it works.


  • Demo video
  • Watch the demo video


For more information visit https://figmatoswift.com
